name: Paper Planes (Pratik Borse)
description:
This is a hyperCasual Game that I made for Fun. In this game, you have to control (Using WASD) the plane which is always moving forward, and help the plane avoid enemies.

Features

  • Simple Mechanics
  • Enemy AI for Enemy Planes
  • Used Trail System
  • HyperCasual
  • Post Processing
  • Design Patterns used
    • Singleton
